channel.title: PHP to HTML SMF?
channel.description:
Hi, I noticed the ads on this site so I looked at the source to try and figure out how you got them. I then realised that this was an html page but SMF comes in php format. Can you please ctell/explain to me how you managed this?
I am particularly interested in getting ads on my site.
Thanks
Jellybean732

it means there no column in the sql called CATEGORY

item.title: PHP to HTML SMF?
item.dc:creator: @Jellybean732 Jellybean732
item.description:
@Jellybean732 wrote:

Almost got it working except this:

Unknown column ‘CATEGORY’ in ‘field list’
File: /vhost/vhost7/j/e/l/jellyscape.co.uk/www/forums/Sources/Ads.php
Line: 190

Any ideas what I’ve done wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: PHP to HTML SMF?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:181393”]I’m trying to think of a good way to explain this. PHP is a server side, scripting language. It processes input and then outputs HTML which is readable by the browser. So when you view-source, you can see all of the HTML, but never any of the PHP since that is on the server.

As to ads on SMF, there is a mod now, but when I first started the forum there wasn’t one, and so I just modified BoardIndex.template.php and put the ad at the top.[/quote]Why BoadIndex.template.php?
Why not index.template.php?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Jellybean732 Jellybean732
item.description:
@Jellybean732 wrote:

Yes because my forums are in php (thanks btw moparisthebest), how do i get my html pages to read my php pages like you’ve done?

EDIT: Nvm done it, thanks Moparisthebest (u r btw lol)

Thanks to every1 tht helped[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2008, 09:36:44 AM[/size][hr]I’m doing great with my forums now thanks but all my ads appear at the top? anyway to fix that? all help is greatly appreciated.

Jellybean732

Read full topic

item.title: PHP to HTML SMF?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well there is
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=255 - Ad management mod
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=351 - Global header and footers

I prefer the Global header and footers, since i only have my ads on the top and bottom it saves the messing around on the ad management mod.

Read full topic

item.title: PHP to HTML SMF?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’m trying to think of a good way to explain this. PHP is a server side, scripting language. It processes input and then outputs HTML which is readable by the browser. So when you view-source, you can see all of the HTML, but never any of the PHP since that is on the server.

As to ads on SMF, there is a mod now, but when I first started the forum there wasn’t one, and so I just modified BoardIndex.template.php and put the ad at the top.

Read full topic
